meanings.definition: A chemical element with the symbol Kr and atomic number 36.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of krypton in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Krypton is used in certain types of lighting.
meanings.sent3: When the balloon filled with krypton popped, it made a funny sound.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like krypton under the bright lights.
meanings.sent5: The glowing krypton seemed to dance in the darkness.

meanings.definition: A colorless, odorless noble gas found in trace amounts in the atmosphere.
meanings.sent1: The balloon floated because it was filled with krypton.
meanings.sent2: Krypton is one of the gases that make up the air we breathe.
meanings.sent3: The invisible krypton gas played hide and seek with the scientists.
meanings.sent4: His voice was as light as krypton, barely noticeable in the room.
meanings.sent5: The elusive krypton slipped through the cracks unnoticed.
